name: Virtual Bangla Keyboard
author: Arif Nezami.

sections.description: This plugin will add a Virtual Bangla Keyboard in your post’s comment form. It will help comment writers to write comments in bangla. The Virtual Keyboard layout is developed by Sabuj Kundu of Amader Projukti. Some java script code is used from Hasin Hayder’s phonetic parser script to insert character at the cursor’s current position. And finally customized and gets WP plugin’s shape by Arif Nezami.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Virtual Bangla Keyboard.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract the zipped file.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

short_description: This Plugin will add a Virtual bangla Keyboard in post's comment form.
